website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for glass tabletop bug repellents.
pros: Vintage look that keeps the bugs away
Will burn for 4-6 hours before refueling is necessary
Set of three in different colors
cons: Some say flames are too large

customer_reviews.title: So we picked this product because of the reviews and nice look aaaand these bad boys are amazing
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I looked at many tiki reviews as we have lots of mesquites. So we picked this product because of the reviews and nice look aaaand these bad boys are amazing!!! They were missing the little chains that hold the lid on but I don’t know if they were really supposed to have those or not? Had a little neighborhood shindig the other night and they were a hit!! I definitely recommend! Just an FYI personal opinion, I would cut down the wick a little first...just to slow down the burn...the flame is huge and they burn pretty fast :)
customer_reviews.author: Shea

customer_reviews.title: Cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! The perfect size for an outdoor table to keep the mosquitos away! We filled ours with TIKI fluid and added a few drops of citronella and lemongrass essential oil.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B.

customer_reviews.title: Pictures so NOT do these justice!
customer_reviews.text: These tiki tabletop torches are so cute! I love the red white and blue colors. The toppers to snuff out the flame and keep the wick covered are the icing on the cake. The wicks are nice and long. Be sure to let your torch in the tiki liquid for at least 30 minutes or your wick will burn up top quickly. Also, be sure to either adjust the wick so only about 1/8 of it is showing. My deck looks so beautiful when these are lit up at night. I relax in my lounge chair and enjoy an hour or so of reading. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Godley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - stop and purchase these torches! ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these torches. Excellent packaging, quality and delivered on time. I would highly recommend purchasing this item. As someone stated. The cap isn't attached but if that's the biggest issue I'll take it. I can't wait for the next gathering to show off my torches. I paid $18.99 with free 2 day shipping with Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Bargin Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful torches at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, with colors that really pop! We use the TIKI Bitefighter oil in these, and they burn with quite a large flame, so they do a good job at keeping the bugs away while adding a nice ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Too much black smoke to enjoy..
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with this product. It’s advertised as a tabletop torch, but they produce so much black smoke and soot that it’s very unpleasant to be around of in any proximity, not to mention unhealthy. I’ve adjusted the wick and it still produces black smoke. There’s no way this can be enjoyed as a tabletop torch. Photos and video show the black smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend built me a huge table for my birthday and I wanted adequate light and big protection. I learned you only need the tiniest bit of wick showing cuz the flames these things give off are huge!! I got the tiki bite fighter fuel and honestly it was no match against the monstrous junebug/beetles that came to call lol. But they are beautiful and I love them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: nice torch lights
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great. We use them in conjunction with some torches on summer evenings for mood lighting and to help keep the biting bugs away on our back patio. There is something about the ambience of firelight that is intimate and engaging. The colors of the glass are pleasant as well. we get several hours of burn time out of them before needing refilling.
customer_reviews.author: Brian ZenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but the smoke negates their use
customer_reviews.text: No matter how long or short the wick is, these things put out more smoke than anything. The flame and glass container itself is beautiful however, the smoke/soot these things put out will blacken anything that is near. I had one sitting on a small table that also serves as an umbrella holder. The pole of the umbrella became so blackened by the soot from burning just one several evenings made me not want to use them again for fear that the smoke was also blackening my brand new patio furniture sitting 10 feet away. I am currently looking for an oil to put in these lamps that will burn smoke free.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa Renae Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Good little oil lamps. BIG FIRE!
customer_reviews.text: The wicks are trimmed a little long for my taste. The result is that they burn with a flame nearly 8 inches tall out of the box and need to be trimmed since the length prevents them from being pushed down. I'm using Tiki brand cedar and citronella fuel in them and I'm very pleased. It would be nice to have the caps attached by a small chain but I can DIY that with a trip to the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wycoff

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and very nice looking. I trimmed the wick to 1/4 “ and the flame is still very high, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: candh

customer_reviews.title: Love These Torches!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting some tiki torches for my front porch for awhile but was trying to find some that aren’t huge and are pretty. I found these here and ordered them along with the fuel and I love them. The mosquitoes are so bad right now and seem to feast on me and my citronella candles never stay lighted with the wind blowing a lot... the flame is quite big and seems to keep all other bugs away too. They are also very pretty. Don’t hesitate! Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: They look beautiful. They would make a good gift, if that's why you're buying. Me? I'm tired of getting bit by mosquitoes. My yard is full of plants and mosquitoes. Cant leave my house without being swarmed. So I looked for something to help, and theres citronella oil for tiki torches? Idk if it works yet, but there's a lot of smoke? It's a very pretty glass torch thing, though. Love the 3 colors, and they came package very securely. I heard jingling when I received the box, but it was just the metal covers that were rolling around.
customer_reviews.author: Chriss

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tabletop bug torches!
customer_reviews.text: These tabletop torches are very cute. I lined up the three on my picnic table. Since they are glass, they will last a long time and still look good even though I am keeping them outdoors all summer. The cap is a snuffer to put the flame out and not a “cover” so it does not screw into the glass canister. The glass is quite thick so they seem durable—even though they are glass and so are breakable. These table top torches are worth the money, I like them a lot, they are very attractive, and I do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Will spill if knocked over, doesn’t repel mosquitos well
customer_reviews.text: Daughter tipped it over accidentally and it spilled all over our countertop. Also when lit and used in our patio, the mosquitos still came within 2 feet of the flame even though I could smell it strongly at 2 ft away. I don’t think it is very effective and it smells more like fuel burning than citronella. It is somewhat unpleasant. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: 2 out of 3 ain't bad,
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 3 ain't bad, but I paid for 3. Unfortunately, the neck of the blue one snapped off sometime between when I filled it a few weeks ago, and when I went to first use it a few minutes ago... Only discovered it when I was about to light it. Really don't want to drain and send back all 3 because of 1 bad unit, my Amazon doesn't work the way I want it to with returns, so I guess I'll just eat it. Not happy about that though.
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzie

customer_reviews.title: Look different than expected.  Work great.
customer_reviews.text: I use bite fighter fluid in Tikis to make it possible to sit outside and enjoy the evenings here in MO. Mosquitos are as bad here as in Florida. These are servicible little lamps that I can rotate in or out depending on the mosquito issue. The glass is solid. I wasn't expecting there to be a pattern on them. It's not ugly, just not what I expected. I would recommend these to others. I would also recommend Amazon post better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Damadefuerza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and effective
customer_reviews.text: I use 2 sets (6 lights) on my front porch, to distribute the mosquito control and provide a glow throughout. It's easy to refill and easy to wipe down. The glass is solid quality, like mason jar thickness. The colors are bright and provide pops of color. The metal caps haven't rusted even though they stay outside even when not in use. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Z K

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. 1. They burn through fluid very quickly. 2. Flame is large. I adjusted the wicks, but the flame is still quite large. Gotta be careful not to scorch your eyebrows. Overall these aren’t bad. They look nice, but they do burn fluid fast and the flame is very high. You really need to push the wicks down so only 1/4“ is sticking out or you get a massive flame.
customer_reviews.author: arias51

customer_reviews.title: NOT UP IN HERE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok the size of the flame is probably my own fault for the wick being a little too long but I dont care one bit. The price was attractive, they are very pretty and most importantly...they work. Period. Even right now I'm sitting on my porch and I can see the mosquitos and gnats in the distance but coming nowhere near as if an impenetrable force is keeping them away. "Not today ya bastards!!!"
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I like these. They are pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: I like these. They are pretty to look at. They seem to work pretty good. I will say, directions say to trim wick at 1/4"...It makes too high of a flame I think for a small table...Keep kids far away from it. I ended up trimming to 1/8 and it helped a little. All in all..good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: They are very pretty for my table inside the gazebo. Only concern is the flame is a big flame, recommend having a way to keep someone from teaching across table and accidently catching fire. These are just like tiki pole flames except you are in much closer proximity if they are on your table. Diffinatly won't be using them with small children around....or drunk adults...lol. Other than that they are beautiful and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Hard to refill cap breaks
customer_reviews.text: After second filling one of the caps stuck and the glass cracked trying to take it off used wd40 to loosen it was like it was frozen to it. The others are sticking too now. Not very good.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works.
customer_reviews.text: These look really nice sitting out back and they give off a nice flame. Pair these with Tiki BITE FIGHTER oil and they do help keep mosquitoes away. They do burn through that oil RAPIDLY, so make sure you buy more oil than you could imagine using. I was worried about them breaking but so far so good. Don't buy replacement wicks, you won't need them. We burned these every night for months and the wicks are still touch the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Beeswax

customer_reviews.title: Great little find
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a set of these torches from another seller. I liked them so much that I bought 2 more sets to give as gifts, this time from another seller. I got the package a few days ago and thought at first that one of the torches was broken as something was clanking around. The torches were fine but the metal snuffers had all come loose and were rolling around in the boxes. A couple got scratched but are still ok. The first seller had placed a thick wedge of Styrofoam on top which held everything securely in place. A safer idea. I can't wait to give these as holiday gifts. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nana58

customer_reviews.title: Portable and great light source!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! Great portable light source with ambience. Love, love. These would make a great gift for a housewarming or whatever occasion. We are at an air bnb and there is no lighting around the table we are sitting at. One was enough, but I will definitely use these at home on my patio. Very pleasant! Plus you can fill them with citronella oil to deter bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jerusha

customer_reviews.title: Copious smoke problems, too-large wick
customer_reviews.text: Solid glass, good snuffer caps, but smoky as heck with a bigger flame than anyone needs. Having a bare modicum of wick exposed and lit changes nothing. Be prepared to light them and wait. If black smoke is a concern, you're going to need some lead time on these. EDIT: Hours later, alas, the problem remains. The wick is simply too big, and pushing it down as far as possible still leaves a much larger flame and more black smoke than most people, me included, will want near them much less directly on their table.
customer_reviews.author: Bat-Radish

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Its a table torch, it works and they came in one piece without pieces missing. Quality seems good. I just leave them in the garden and after a few month (with rain and sun) they look the same, just a bit dirtier. They do "smoke" more than I would like, but thats probably due to the fuel and not the torch.
customer_reviews.author: coolhand

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are so worth it. After years of getting citronella candles that get ruined when you leave them out and have a tiny wick letting off a small amount of citronella, we decided to try these out and love them. We set four up around our gazebo in the backyard and they work really well! The flames are big and seem to deter lots of insects, and the look and large flames create a nice atmosphere when you're hanging out. Definitely recommend, especially for this price.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeeee these! They’re super cute and gets the job done. Didn’t get bit once! Just add torch fuel and let them burn a couple minutes before sitting outside. The small caps makes it super easy to put the flame out. So happy I brought them!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A.

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't believe these would actually work but to my surprise they did quite well with tiki bitefighter fuel. I couldn't sit in my backyard for longer than 5 minutes without being ate alive. Since purchasing these I rarely get bit and I hang out for hours at a time. Good cheap solution for a mosquito problem.
customer_reviews.author: Wes Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Colors sent
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating. I specifically ordered the red, green, blue ones even though they were a little more expensive as a gift to go with a friend's new outside decor. There were two reds and a green. They seem like nice little torches but not what was advertised. Not that big a deal except it was supposed to be a summer housewarming gift and not Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These make your outdoors seem festive!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love these! They add a BIG pop to your decor and they keep the bugs away! A suggestion - keep the wick as low as possible in the bottle! It saves “fuel” and flame isn’t as high! I think these would be a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Dan'sBella

customer_reviews.title: Nice table top size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small table top size. They burn fuel quickly. Will fit nicely on tables and out-of-the-way places since so small. After burning 4 to 5 hours they need refilled- maybe as the wick burns down some and not suck a generous flame, the bug fighter fuel will last longer in them.
customer_reviews.author: MN66

customer_reviews.title: These are heavy and well made. I love the colours
customer_reviews.text: These are really heavy and well made. The colours are bright and beautiful. The Tiki Torch Fuel does cast black smoke if you are trying to ward off mosquitoes, but I filled one with Parafin oil for the screened porch just for the light and it does great. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K

customer_reviews.title: We use these everyday!
customer_reviews.text: We just love our little Tiki torches. They are a lifesaver here in Mississippi with all of the bugs and mosquitoes here. We use the citronella oil to burn and it also keeps the pesty love bugs at bay. They can't stand the smoke and it makes our breezeway/patio area more pleasant to sit in when they aren't around. I have about 10 around our yard.
customer_reviews.author: T L Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito be gone!
customer_reviews.text: I got the red white and blue set, love these and they really do work well. They are super thick! My 19 month old grabbed one while I was taking them out of the package and ran when I tried to grab it, he needed up throwing it down on concrete and it didn’t break!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: great for back yard evenings
customer_reviews.text: I prefer oil lamps to torches. These are easily moved to table tops. I place them throughout my back porch seating area. They are so much nicer than dealing with the mess and fire hazards of a fire pit. They take tiki torch fuel. They provide a nice ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Butler

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, purposeful and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: We used these on a 2 month camping trip. (We also have two other tiki"pearl of the sea" torches) These were wonderful. Kids running around and none broke! The color has stayed nicely and they worked! (Of course, with kids and fire our attentiveness was required.) One was knocked over by a ball, but we just put it back upright, relit the wick, has another fire safety talk and it was of use again! With minimal to no spilling. I would recommend these torches.
customer_reviews.author: Huntress

customer_reviews.title: I wish these didnt have such a big flame
customer_reviews.text: So these are only getting 3 stars because the flame gets very big. Makes it scary to use on a small table top. One has to be very careful. I am afraid they could be a fire hazard.Also, they produce black smoke. Any ideas on how to reduce the flame or smoke? They are really pretty tho.
customer_reviews.author: faith

customer_reviews.title: Cute and portable little tikis!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the red white and blue ones but these are cute and colorful as well. They are very portable and easy to fill, light and cover when done with them. I use the tiki citronella fluid and it worked pretty well to keep bugs away. I would get them as a gift for someone, maybe a hostess gift for a summer bbq or something would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: cmm318

customer_reviews.title: Super Tiki!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. The colors are great and they add a great touch to the backyard. The flames get pretty high so I lowered the wicks to about a 1/4" showing. With Tiki fuel they put out a ton of bug deterring fumes. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: B.T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice - Do there job
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the garden and when I am out grilling . They do the job and keep the bugs away. The only (slight) complaint is that they burn a little to wild for me and I would prefer a smaller flame and a little less smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty torches
customer_reviews.text: This was my second set. The first set came delivered broken inside the box. It was a gift. Packaging was absolutely terrible on the first set. Was very happy to find I could just drop it off at my local Kohl's for return. They are very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product 👍
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! We can now have dinner on our porch bug free. We used to have just four tiki torches and a citronella candle on the table. With these, it is like night and day around the table. Would buy these again hands down. Very easy to refill.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer (P)

customer_reviews.title: POOR PACKAGING !
customer_reviews.text: First package to arrive was a total disaster....I did not even open it; I could tell by the sound it was a box of broken glass. Tiny shards were coming out of the seams of the box. I returned it, and another one was shipped; no problem. It arrived intact. The items themselves are nice; brightly colored and simply made. I filled with the citronella stuff, and it appears to keep the mosquitos away, but not the tiny gnats.
customer_reviews.author: redninja

customer_reviews.title: Could be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice but not worth the price in my opinion. I tried to cancel the order and re-order the set in a different color that was $10 cheaper. Amazon would not cancel so I kept these. They are nice, I just think they could be bigger for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Franken

customer_reviews.title: Table torches
customer_reviews.text: I have a 30 ft pool in my backyard with a picnic table and two other tables with umbrellas. I needed to provide insect protection for everyone who would be in the yard. I order the trio of red/white and blue tiki brand 6 in molded glassed table torches. I love them. They are just what I wanted and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: J Cook

customer_reviews.title: Good...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of soot from the wicks, needs to be at least 10ft from where you sit... Although , they stay lit in windy condition and even a lite rain, we have six of them. Fuel consumtion per container depends on how much wick you have exposed. It can be a V8 or a 4 cylinder on the ratio...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have given these as gifts a couple times. They are festive and beautiful. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Holds up in the wind!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I will not ever buy wick candles again. It’s very windy where we live and they did not blow out. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not again
customer_reviews.text: One Broke at a 3" fall, like tipped, and broke...oil all over. Another one will not un screw open after one time burning, cant re fill. I have 1 out of 3 working less that 2 months from purchase. Not again.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: 2 - Wonderful, 1 - Not so much
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of these. When I received them, I started taking them out of the box and filling them up and noticed one was broke. That is the only reason for 4 stars and not 5. I would exchange but since the other 2 are filled, I don’t want to empty them and send back dirty used ones that work.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne P.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them, they are stylish, super functional and work great. Just bought a 2nd set
customer_reviews.author: Cherish

customer_reviews.title: Whoa big flame
customer_reviews.text: These things put off such a high flame I thought we were going to burn our porch down! I didn’t see any bugs though :)
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Wick not adjustable, it’s the only missing.
customer_reviews.text: I love mine. I get lots of compliments and 2 friends actually ordered for themselves. I cut the wick as I wanted a smaller flame and it’s NOT ajustable. Pros:Over all, they look great, not easy to tip over and easy to refill. Cons: The gas burns quickly, wick not adjustable and black smoke can be seen (depending on oil used) For 15$ for all 3 lanterns, it’s a good price and hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I like
customer_reviews.text: These candles give out a lot of black smoke. I bought the bug liquid from target to fill them up. The flame is huge and the smoke really smokes out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cardona

customer_reviews.title: They won’t stay colored for long!
customer_reviews.text: These were so awesome for the first year. We loved them so much, we gifted some to friends who moved. Then the colors on ours completely faded out, and last time I saw our friends they were all chipped up. Just buy clear ones. They’re cheaper and will at least stay clear (except for soot)
customer_reviews.author: kareterra

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave it unsupervised
customer_reviews.text: These work great but be careful. The flames can be very high. My wife lit one, went in the house, i came outside and saw that there must've been a wind that blew the tablecloth into the flame causing a fire and even set the outdoor rug ablaze too. Thankfully i was there In time. Great product but don't leave it unsupervised for even a second.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: These Work Very Well
customer_reviews.text: Much better than tiki torches and worth every penny. Try and keep out of reach of small children and pets.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Tarr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tiki lamps!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. M. I ordered one set to try them out. We’ve tried a lot of things to keep mosquitos away. These work well with the oil- Tiki Bite Fighter. Also the wind can’t blow these out with a 20 mph gust. I loved them so much I bought 2 more sets. Study, attractive, functional !
customer_reviews.author: Alana Canupp

customer_reviews.title: No bites tonight!
customer_reviews.text: Made lots of light and a nice controlled smoke that kept mosquitoes away last night. Only lit two...that’s how efficient they are! And also very pretty on my table next to my rocker!
customer_reviews.author: TheFamily

customer_reviews.title: Look nice and repels bugs
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can put these next to you wherever you are outside rather than the tiki torches that you have to shove into the ground. Great to repel bugs plus they’re super cute and decorative!!
customer_reviews.author: Shaylee

customer_reviews.title: Burns fast
customer_reviews.text: Burns fast and i still see mosquitos around with them on :/
customer_reviews.author: TsaTsa

customer_reviews.title: very nice table top item and it does work.
customer_reviews.text: kinda got me on this one. There was a same set with darker colors at half the price that kept saying out of stock, so i went for this same bottles but twice the price. Ut she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works well, looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set of 3 table candles for the deck. Look very pretty, flame is moderately high, not too high, the oil I used did produce only a little smoke. They do repel mosquitoes quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Fauzia Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye Bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need to keep the mosquitoes away. Nice, small, and portable set. I paired it with the Tiki brand oil. I can feel a difference in usability of my out door space. Living is south Florida bugs can get bad. These definitely have helped. It also creates A nice ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaMommy

customer_reviews.title: Can be dirty
customer_reviews.text: Love this little torches EXCEPT for the amount of black smoke and soot they put out. Make sure to keep them far enough away from people when burning because they will get the black smoke in their nose and carefully handle them when you move them because the soot of the wick will break off and get on your outside furniture or deck, even you clothing and skin. They are cute and do their job, you just need to keep them at a distance.
customer_reviews.author: Jody M. Olen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Haven’t sat out a whole evening with them but tested them out for a few last night and they burn good with the tiki torch fuel. Look pretty too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Giana

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, pretty tikis for this price!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tabletop tikis for the price! I was so impressed! They’re unique and beautiful on my patio table, and add a nice pop of color. The flames are a bit high for me to use all three at the same time so close together, so I’ll be moving them when in use.
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Too smoky for table top use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to keep the mosquitoes away, but these table torches are too smoky and smelly to use in close proximity of your table. They are nice for creating a cozy atmosphere, just don't place them too close to your seating area.
customer_reviews.author: LorenzoLargo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy. Easy to fill. Wish the caps had chains. Little on the pricey side but they are pretty so I guess it’s worth it. Bought two sets in different colors so I could get a rainbow of color. These are giftable - come packaged nicely in a sturdy box.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for a table around ppl.
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely not suitable for a table. The flame is bigger then a tiki torch. I even tried pulling the wick down. Otherwise, they are good. They burn through fluid very quickly but that may be because it doesn’t hold a lot of fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Giallanza

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very very thick wicks with strong large flame. Uses a LOT of fuel. Downside.. one cap is so loose you cannot tighten it completely. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Do not stay lit after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: They won’t stay lit after a few uses. The wicks aren’t really reusable. Recommend you buy other tiki torches instead
customer_reviews.author: mbc727

customer_reviews.title: just as awesome as all the reviews
customer_reviews.text: just as awesome as all the reviews! why spend hundreds or thousands of dollars on a fire table, simply put these on your table instead and it functions the same, lights nicely and keeps the bugs away. Fun mix of colors is very summery and blends with most outdoor decor. So easy to light with a match and to snuff with the included metal cap.
customer_reviews.author: TribecaTracy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect to put anywhere outside and look great. Tired of the cheap poles and they are still in perfect condition being left outside for the past 2 years. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nina Jones

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought a set!
customer_reviews.text: My sister has a set of these and I liked them so much that I got a set as well. I've been using them for over a month now and they're great! I had seen a few reviews saying they put off too much black smoke. Those people clearly don't understand the point of tiki torches. They aren't candles. They're meant to keep bugs away with the smoke they put off, which they do very well! Probably going to buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Jimi

customer_reviews.title: Makes the air very Smokey
customer_reviews.text: Creates a very very very Smokey atmosphere. You can smell the chemicals in the air. Doesn’t work on flies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tiki Lamps
customer_reviews.text: Not only do these put off nice lighting around the patio table, but they are a lovely centerpiece as well. Works very well and easy to use to keep the mosquitos away.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love these little guys
customer_reviews.text: Very nice products. We are using the clean burn fuel in these. They work great and keep the bugs away as intended. The fuel does burn pretty quickly. I wish these had the adjustable wick like some of their other burners. They are very stylish looking and a great addition to out backyard patio. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D Conley

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things, this is my second time buying cuz I wanted more! Easy to fill and move them anywhere on your patio for flame ambiance and bug control. I put on the edge of my jacuzzi
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes A. Martishius

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my mom and they work great to keep away the mosquitoes that have been bothering her. I pair then with tiki Citronella fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Some_Technophile

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I love the bottle design however when lit Flame gets out of control VERY dangerous! Flame blows high and unruly. I would not recommend this product. Very dangerous We just threw them away. Our firefighter friend was here and said absolutely get rid of them. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alberino

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These little jars are a gem! They look great,are well made and also have a large enough capacity for multiple uses without refill. I burned them for several hours at least 5nights after filling 2/3full and they hadn't run empty
customer_reviews.author: Alex Curran

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our backyard patio. The flame is very big, in a good way. I bought the tiki citronella fuel and it keeps the bugs away with no black smoke. The lanterns are colorful and pretty, small enough to easily move around. I’m very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Herbie

customer_reviews.title: Huge flame. A ton of smoke.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these because I thought they would be cute when we have dinners outside and we’re having the worst time with mosquitos but I’m returning it. The flame is huge! And there’s so much smoke. In my personal opinion, this is not meant for table top. I paired it with the citronella oil and I don’t think that worked either cuz my family, dogs and I still go bitten.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ortiz Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: We bring these with on the camping trips where we are somewhere campfires aren't allowed or it's just too hot to have a fire. Such a nice ambience and they repel mosquitoes pretty well if you buy a good fuel to burn in them. The only downside is that we struggle with how to transport them to and from the camping trip without making somewhat of an oily mess.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Tesar

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These match my deck furniture perfectly, and add some color to my backyard. I was looking for stylish tiki torches, and these are the best ones I've spent my money on!
customer_reviews.author: Grace McKee

customer_reviews.title: Crazy aggressive flames
customer_reviews.text: Lit these for a socially distant dinner outdoors. The flames were aggressive for the table. We ended up moving it off to corner of backyard.
customer_reviews.author: M. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Functional
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set for myself and a set as a gift. They look nice and keep the bugs away. The default wick length is a bit long, I'll shorten it for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Anne S.

customer_reviews.title: Get them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife and she loves them. They are very beautiful and works wonderfully. Looks smaller in the pictures but it was a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the mosquitoes away!
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! Great colors and they provide a nice fire light without lighting a big ole fire. We bought the fluid for mosquito replant and it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose but not great
customer_reviews.text: They serve their purpose but the oil leaks when being used. Need to put something under them or you’ll ruin your table
customer_reviews.author: S herrera

customer_reviews.title: Nice traditional outdoor lanterns
customer_reviews.text: These crank up some good light and heat outdoors. We use them with Citronella type fuel. Open flame means you need to be careful. Especially with young kids.
customer_reviews.author: LevitMan

customer_reviews.title: Bright & Pretty
customer_reviews.text: They are easy to fill. Easy to see when they need to be refilled. Heavy enough not to worry about tipping/blowing over outside. They are bright and colorful. When lit they put off a great deal of light. A great addition to our patio table tops.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: TIKI Brand 6-Inch Molded Glass Table Torch
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband use these on our deck starting near dark. They work great. I have to say I must be sweeter than my husband because he doesn't get bit at all---I still get some bites but it's not as bad if we didn't have these burning.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Really big flame. Careful!
customer_reviews.text: Careful under an umbrella. These suckers shoot a big flame. And they go through a ton of fluid. Other than that, they look great and Seem to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo S. Silvio

customer_reviews.title: Nice table top torches
customer_reviews.text: I love these and have used them many times since purchasing them. The table they sit on is under a 60' tall walnut tree and the falling walnuts have not damaged them. The colors are nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but wish the caps were attached!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! They burn well and I love the colors. The one thing that bothers me is that the snuffer caps aren't attached to the glass bases. The caps look like they have loop holes drilled in for that very purpose but no string! Something I'll have to figure out on my own so they stay together and don't get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kotzan

product_meta.title: TIKI 6-Inch Molded Glass Table Torch, Red, Green & Blue (Set of 3)
product_meta.description: Color:Red, Green and Blue| Pattern Name:TorchFew things are as enjoyable as dining outside with family and friends. Next time you dine al fresco, gather everyone around your table to experience the warm glow of natural flame lighting. A TIKI Brand Molded Glass Tabletop Torch makes a perfect centerpiece to illuminate your table and your conversations. Group more than one together to create a striking focal point or use individually as colorful accents on tables around your yard or patio. Each 12-ounce fill delivers up to 5 hours of burn time when used with TIKI Brand Torch Fuel. Available in Rio Red, Key Lime Green, and Ocean Blue glass (sold as a set, one of each color), the modern design of these table torches looks great with any style of décor. TIKIBrand Molded Glass Tabletop Torches are sold separately and come with the 6 inch tall glass vessel, a long-lasting fiberglass wick, and a metal snuffer to extinguish the flame at the end of the night. TIKI Brand Torch Fuel sold separately.
feature_bullets: GLASS TABLE TORCH SET: Made from textured, molded glass, this set of table torches comes in 3 vibrant colors: red, green and blue. The smart, versatile design will look great with any style of décor.Best when used with TIKI Brand torch fuel.
STRIKING DÉCOR: Group them together to create a striking centerpiece or use them individually as colorful accents around your yard or patio. Each 12 ounce fill delivers up to 5 hours of burn time
PERSONAL PARADISE: We can help you create an outdoor paradise with our easy-to-use, long lasting TIKI products, designed in a wide variety of styles to suit any yard, garden, lawn, patio, or porch
STYLISH INNOVATION: We continue to innovate outdoor lighting with stylish designs & products like our mosquito repellent torch fuels, adjustable flame Table Torches & Citronella candle buckets
BEST OF THE BACKYARD: For over 60 years we've made outdoor torches to illuminate your yard or garden along with candles, wicks, stakes, stands, torch fuel & other accessories to light your landscape

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,990 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
